thread.section_title: Otticanet Recensioni| Recensioni dei clienti per Otticanet | www.otticanet.com | 7 di 547
thread.title: Azran

author: Azran
title: Azran
text:
I love the selection of awesome brands they have. The customer service (Dragana) was very helpful. Shipping was fast. I am happy with the Thom Browne eyewear that I bought. 100% authentic and new.
Wish that they put more pictures of the products and offer free shipping for certain amount of purchase with Duty and Tax Paid.
Overall, highly recommended, and will definitely buy again.
